item.title: 3 ways to read input with a Go CLI
item.description: Tutorial with examples showing 3 different ways to read user input when building a command line interface (CLI) with Go

item.title: Go CLI User Input Experiment
item.description: While building a CLI with Go, I ran a few little experiments without business logic to ensure that I was able to read user input exactly as expected.
